tasks.description: Initialize Supabase project and create the database schema for users, projects, project_members, and tasks tables as specified in the PRD.
tasks.details:
1. Create a new Supabase project
2. Configure authentication settings for email/password login
3. Create the following tables with appropriate relationships:
   - `projects` (id, title, description, owner_id, created_at)
   - `project_members` (id, project_id, user_id)
   - `tasks` (id, project_id, title, description, status, due_date, assignee_id, created_by, created_at, updated_at)
4. Set up appropriate foreign key constraints
5. Configure row-level security policies for data access control
6. Create necessary indexes for performance optimization
<info added on 2025-06-19T05:52:42.026Z>
6. Update the database schema based on 2024 best practices:

   - Users Table:
     ```sql
     CREATE TABLE users (
       id UUID DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() PRIMARY KEY,
       email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
       encrypted_password TEXT NOT NULL,
       full_name TEXT,
       avatar_url TEXT,
       created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
       updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
     );
     CREATE INDEX idx_users_email ON users(email);
     ```

   - Projects Table:
     ```sql
     CREATE TABLE projects (
       id UUID DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() PRIMARY KEY,
       title TEXT NOT NULL,
       description TEXT,
       owner_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
       created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
       updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
     );
     CREATE INDEX idx_projects_owner_id ON projects(owner_id);
     ```

   - Project Members Table:
     ```sql
     CREATE TABLE project_members (
       id UUID DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() PRIMARY KEY,
       project_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
       user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
       role TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (role IN ('owner', 'admin', 'member')),
       created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
       UNIQUE(project_id, user_id)
     );
     CREATE INDEX idx_project_members_project_user ON project_members(project_id, user_id);
     ```

   - Tasks Table:
     ```sql
     CREATE TABLE tasks (
       id UUID DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() PRIMARY KEY,
       project_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
       title TEXT NOT NULL,
       description TEXT,
       status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (status IN ('todo', 'in_progress', 'done')),
       due_date DATE,
       assignee_id UUID REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
       created_by UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id),
       created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
       updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
     );
     CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_project_id ON tasks(project_id);
     CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_assignee_id ON tasks(assignee_id);
     CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_status ON tasks(status);
     CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_due_date ON tasks(due_date);
     ```

7. Implement RLS policies for each table:
   - Users: Allow users to read/update only their own data
   - Projects: Allow access only to project members
   - Project Members: Allow read access to members, management to owners/admins
   - Tasks: Allow read access to project members, create/update/delete based on role

8. Consider additional best practices:
   - Use UUIDs for primary keys
   - Include created_at/updated_at timestamps
   - Implement check constraints for valid values
   - Use cascading deletes for referential integrity
   - Add unique constraints where appropriate

tasks.title: Implement SaaS Billing and Subscription Management System
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive SaaS billing and subscription management system, integrating with Stripe for payment processing, creating subscription plans, implementing usage-based billing, and providing billing dashboards for customers and administrators.
tasks.details:
1. Integrate Stripe API:
   - Install Stripe SDK for Node.js
   - Set up Stripe webhook endpoint for event handling
   - Implement secure handling of Stripe API keys

2. Create Subscription Plans:
   - Define plan tiers (free, premium, enterprise) in Stripe Dashboard
   - Implement API endpoints for fetching available plans
   - Create UI components for displaying plan options

3. Implement Usage-Based Billing:
   - Design and implement a usage tracking system
   - Create API endpoints for reporting usage metrics
   - Set up Stripe metered billing for usage-based charges

4. Add Payment Method Management:
   - Implement Stripe Elements for secure card input
   - Create API endpoints for adding, updating, and removing payment methods
   - Develop UI components for managing payment methods

5. Create Customer Billing Dashboard:
   - Design and implement a billing overview page
   - Display current subscription, usage, and upcoming charges
   - Show billing history and allow invoice downloads
   - Implement subscription upgrade/downgrade functionality

6. Develop Billing Admin Tools:
   - Create an admin dashboard for managing customer subscriptions
   - Implement functionality to view and modify customer billing details
   - Add ability to generate reports on revenue, active subscriptions, etc.

7. Handle Subscription Lifecycle:
   - Implement logic for subscription creation, modification, and cancellation
   - Set up automated billing cycles and payment collection
   - Handle failed payments and implement dunning management

8. Implement Proration and Credits:
   - Set up proration logic for subscription changes
   - Implement system for applying credits to customer accounts

9. Create Notification System:
   - Set up email notifications for successful payments, failed charges, etc.
   - Implement in-app notifications for billing-related events

10. Ensure Compliance and Security:
    - Implement proper encryption for sensitive data
    - Ensure compliance with PCI DSS standards
    - Set up audit logs for all billing-related actions

11. Develop Testing and Sandbox Environments:
    - Create a sandbox environment for testing billing scenarios
    - Implement unit and integration tests for billing functions
    - Set up end-to-end tests for critical billing workflows

tasks.title: Implement Advanced SaaS Features and Scale Infrastructure
tasks.description: Develop and integrate advanced SaaS features including analytics, collaboration tools, API management, security enhancements, and performance optimizations to support multi-tenant scale.
tasks.details:
1. Advanced Analytics and Reporting:
   - Implement a data warehouse using BigQuery or Redshift
   - Create ETL pipelines to aggregate and transform usage data
   - Develop customizable dashboards using a BI tool like Metabase or Looker
   - Implement role-based access control for analytics

2. Cross-Organization Collaboration:
   - Develop a shared workspace feature for inter-org projects
   - Implement document sharing and version control
   - Create a user directory and permission system for external collaborators

3. API Rate Limiting and Quotas:
   - Implement API gateway using Kong or AWS API Gateway
   - Set up rate limiting rules based on subscription tiers
   - Create a quota management system for API usage
   - Develop a dashboard for customers to monitor their API usage

4. Advanced Security Features:
   - Integrate SSO using OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect
   - Implement SAML support for enterprise customers
   - Set up multi-factor authentication
   - Enhance data encryption at rest and in transit

5. Custom Branding per Organization:
   - Create a theming engine for UI customization
   - Implement a custom domain feature for each organization
   - Develop a white-labeling system for resellers

6. Data Export and Migration Tools:
   - Create data export functionality in various formats (CSV, JSON)
   - Develop an import wizard for data migration from other systems
   - Implement scheduled backups and restore functionality

7. Performance Monitoring and Optimization:
   - Set up application performance monitoring using New Relic or Datadog
   - Implement database query optimization and caching strategies
   - Develop a load testing suite using tools like k6 or Apache JMeter
   - Create auto-scaling policies for the application and database tiers

8. Multi-Tenant Architecture Enhancements:
   - Refactor database schema for improved multi-tenancy
   - Implement tenant isolation at the application layer
   - Develop a tenant provisioning and management system
